nodes.text: The Mandalorian: Boba Fett Returns is a forthcoming young readers graphic novel in the Screen Comix series. The book adapts episodes from the second season of The Mandalorian, particularly those featuring Boba Fett. It is scheduled to be published by Random House on January 4, 2022.
A graphic novel-style retelling with full-color images and dialogue from Star Wars: The Mandalorian on Disney+!

The adventures of the Mandalorian, a lone gunfighter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, are now retold in the new Screen Comix format! The mysterious Mandalorian walks a thin line between right and wrong far from the authority of the New Republic in the epic addition to the Star Wars universe, now available on Disney+. This 80-paged graphic novel-style retelling features the return of the notorious Boba Fett. With final frames and dialogue from the series in vibrant full color, it will delight fans of all ages.
